id_table_2.caption: Table 3:Text-to-audio generation resultson AudioCaps dataset(Kim et al.,2019).Table 4:Text-to-video generation resultson MSR-VTT dataset(Xu et al.,2016).Table 5:Text-to-image generation resultson COCO-captions dataset(Lin et al.,2014).

references: Video & Audio & Image Generation.          In the text-to-audio generation task, as shown in                  Table                   5                , LLMBind adopts CoDi           (Tang et al.,             2023            )          as the baseline generation model and achieves an FD score of 22.90 and an IS score of 8.77 on the AudioCaps           (Kim et al.,             2019            )          dataset, outperforming models like NeXT-GPT and AudioLDM. In the text-to-image generation task, as shown in                  Table                   5                , LLMBind employs Stable Diffusion           (Rombach et al.,             2022a            )          as the baseline generation model and attains an FID score of 11.21 on the COCO-caption           (Lin et al.,             2014            )          dataset, surpassing models like NeXT-GPT and CoDi. In the text-to-video generation task, as depicted in                  Table                   5                , LLMBind selects ModelScopeT2V           (Wang et al.,             2023            )          as the baseline generation model and obtains an FID of 11.09 and a CLIPSIM score of 0.2930 on the MSR-VTT           (Xu et al.,             2016            )          dataset, with a higher FID score and a slightly lower CLIPSIM score than NExT-GPT.In terms of generation tasks, since LLMBind does not perform lossy training on the generation models, it can be assumed that its generative capability largely depends on the chosen generation models. With sufficient computational resources, LLMBind can employ better-performing models to achieve superior generation results selectively.

references: Referring Segmentation.          For referring segmentation task, as illustrated in                  Table                   6                , LLMBind achieves superior results on various datasets. On the refCOCO dataset, for the val, testA, and testB splits, LLMBind achieves scores of 76.9, 78.5, and 73.2, respectively. Similarly, on the refCOCO dataset, the model records scores of 67.8, 71.9, and 60.8 for val, testA, and testB. On the refCOCOG dataset, LLMBind achieves 69.8 and 70.8.

Reasoning Segmentation.          We evaluate the performance of LLMBind on the referring segmentation task. For a fair comparison, we use the LISA-7B model as our benchmark. As shown in                  Table                   6                , LLMBind achieves GIoU and CIoU scores of 62.4 and 66.9 on the ReasonSeg dataset           (Lai et al.,             2023            )          , which exceeds LISA-7B with a large margin (8.8 and 12.9) and comparable with LISA-13B.

references: Rank of LoRA.          As shown in                  Table                   9                , we conduct detailed experiments with different ranks of LoRA and found that our framework exhibits slight performance variation across various settings. Therefore, we chose a final rank of 8, for a balance between training cost and model performance.

Training Steps.          Regarding the number of training iterations, we design experiments with four distinct settings: 5k, 6k, 7k, and 8k training steps. These variations were chosen to systematically evaluate the impact of training duration on model performance. As detailed in                  Table                   9                , our findings reveal a clear trend: longer iteration steps consistently yield improvements in both gIoU and cIoU metrics.

Number of MoE Layers.          For the configuration of MoE layers, we conduct experiments with 16, 10, 8, and 0 layers, with the results presented in                  Table                   9                . The model’s performance generally improves with an increasing number of MoE layers. Due to limited model memory, we do not perform experiments with 32 MoE layers, but we believe that more MoE layers could further enhance the performance.

references: Number of All Experts and Top-K Activated Experts.          In our MoE framework, the number of all experts and the number of Top-K activated experts are both crucial. In                  Table                   10                , we briefly explore how different numbers of experts and activated experts affect model performance. The findings align with our expectations: when the number of experts is fixed, more activated experts improve model performance; similarly, increasing the number of experts enhances performance when the number of activated experts is constant.

id_table_14.caption: Table 11:Interactive image generation and editing data
table: Of course! Here’s an image of a cosmic jellyfish: <gen> a cosmic jellyfish with neon tentacles floating in space </gen>
Wow, that’s amazing! Can you show me a cosmic jellyfish with some galaxies in the background?
Certainly! Here’s a modified image of the cosmic jellyfish with galaxies in the background: <edit> a cosmic jellyfish with neon tentacles floating amidst colorful galaxies in space </edit>
This is exactly what I had in mind! I’m so excited about this tattoo now. Can you show me a smaller version of the cosmic jellyfish, maybe in a minimalist style?
Absolutely! Here’s a minimalist version of the cosmic jellyfish: <gen> a simple line art of a cosmic jellyfish with a serene and modern aesthetic </gen>
I love it! It’s going to be hard to choose which one to get. Thanks for all your help!
You’re welcome! I’m glad I could assist you in visualizing your cosmic jellyfish tattoo. Let me know if there’s anything else I can do for you.
I’m curious about a magical forest with glowing mushrooms. Can you show me what it looks like?
Certainly! Here is the concept of a magical forest with glowing mushrooms: <gen> a magical forest with glowing mushrooms </gen>
Wow, that looks amazing! Is there a special creature that lives in this forest?
Yes, there is! Let me show you a unique creature that inhabits this magical forest: <edit> a magical forest with glowing mushrooms and a special creature </edit>
I’d love to see more details of the creature and its surroundings. Can you provide a closer look?
Absolutely! Here is a closer look at the special creature and its enchanting surroundings: <edit> a magical forest with glowing mushrooms, featuring a special creature in its habitat </edit>
This is fantastic! Can you tell me more about the magical properties of the glowing mushrooms?
Certainly! The glowing mushrooms in this forest possess magical qualities, emitting a soft and enchanting light that illuminates the entire area, creating an otherworldly atmosphere.
I’m planning a trip to the beach; can you show me what a picturesque beach looks like?
Sure! Here is a breathtaking beach scene. <gen> a picturesque beach with golden sand and crystal-clear blue water </gen>
Wow, that looks amazing! Can you also show me a beach with palm trees and hammocks?
Absolutely! Here is a serene beach setting with palm trees and hammocks. <edit> a picturesque beach with palm trees and hammocks </edit>
This looks so relaxing. I wonder what a beach at sunset looks like. Can you show me that?
Of course! Here is a stunning sunset beach view. <edit> a picturesque beach at sunset </edit>
Oh, that’s so beautiful. I’d love to have this as a desktop wallpaper. Can you create one for me?
Sure thing! Here is a desktop wallpaper featuring a picturesque beach at sunset. <edit> a desktop wallpaper of a picturesque beach at sunset </edit>

id_table_15.caption: Table 12:Interactive audio generation data
table: Certainly! I have just the audio clip you’re looking for. It begins with the calm hum of the motor as it idles, and then gradually builds up to a roaring acceleration. This recording beautifully captures the evolving soundscape of the motor’s performance. <audio_cap> A motor hums as it idles then accelerates </audio_cap>
I’m in need of an audio file that captures the thrilling experience of an engine revving, with the added excitement of humming and squealing tires. Can you help me with that?

Absolutely! I’ve got the perfect audio snippet for you. It’s a recording that captures the adrenaline-pumping sound of an engine revving, accompanied by the intense humming and the screeching of tires. Get ready to feel the rush! <audio_cap> Revving of an engine with humming and squealing tires </audio_cap>
Can you create an audio clip with the sound of people speaking while a car engine runs?

Absolutely! I have just the audio clip you’re looking for. It captures the ambient noise of a lively conversation happening alongside the constant hum of a running car engine. The combination of human voices and the mechanical sound of the engine creates an intriguing auditory experience. Enjoy! <audio_cap> People speaking while car engine runs </audio_cap>
I’d love to listen to a recording of a duck quacking loudly with insect noises in the background.

Absolutely! I have just the audio clip for you. Prepare to be immersed in nature’s orchestra as you hear the distinct sound of a duck quacking loudly, accompanied by the gentle symphony of buzzing insects in the background. Enjoy the harmonious blend of these natural sounds! <audio_cap> A duck quacking loudly with insect noises in the background </audio_cap>
I need some audio that captures the essence of a thunderstorm, with the added element of a vehicle in motion. Can you help me find it?

Of course! Prepare to be transported into the heart of a thunderous storm. I’ve got the perfect audio recording for you: the symphony of rain cascading from the sky, intermingled with the rolls of thunder, all while a vehicle races through the rain-soaked streets. Get ready to feel the power and energy of nature in this captivating audio experience. <audio_cap> Rain falls and thunder rolls while a vehicle runs </audio_cap>

I’m trying to recreate a specific audio ambiance in my story. It involves a man speaking, and in the background, you can hear birds chirping intermittently. Additionally, there’s a small machine that makes short whirring sounds. Can you help me paint this audio picture?

Absolutely! Picture a tranquil scene outdoors, where the delicate melodies of chirping birds dance in the air. Amidst this natural symphony, a man’s voice resonates, creating an engaging narrative. Accompanying his speech are brief intervals of a small machine emitting gentle whirring sounds, adding a touch of mechanical presence to the serene environment. It’s a unique audio blend that brings together the beauty of nature and human activity. <audio_cap> A man speaks and a small machine whirs shortly several times while birds chirp in the background </audio_cap>
I’m in the mood for some soothing sounds. Can you find me an audio recording of water flowing in a stream?

Of course! I have just the audio you’re looking for. Here’s a recording that captures the tranquil melody of water gently flowing in a serene stream. Enjoy the peaceful ambiance! <audio_cap> Water is flowing in a stream </audio_cap>

id_table_16.caption: Table 13:Interactive video generation data
table: Absolutely! I found a video that captures the act of toggling a light switch on and off repeatedly. It should satisfy your curiosity and provide an interesting visual representation of this action. <video_cap> Turning light on and off </video_cap>
I’m curious to see a video where someone switches a light on and off repeatedly. Can you find one for me?

Absolutely! I found a video that captures the act of toggling a light switch on and off repeatedly. It should satisfy your curiosity and provide an interesting visual representation of this action. <video_cap> Turning light on and off </video_cap>
I have a dusty floor that needs cleaning. I wonder what it would look like if a vacuum cleaner cleaned the floor during the daytime.

Ah, I can certainly help you visualize that. Imagine a bright and sunny day with rays of sunlight streaming through the windows. The vacuum cleaner glides across the floor, sucking up the dust particles, leaving behind beautifully clean and clear surfaces. The sound of the vacuum hums in the background, indicating the effectiveness of its cleaning. Here’s a video clip capturing the scene for you to get a better sense of it. <video_cap> Vacuum cleaner cleaning the floor with dust on it during daytime </video_cap>
Show me a video that encapsulates the allure of Venice during its carnival season. I want to witness the joyful interactions between tourists and the carnival masks in Piazza San Marco.

Your wish is my command! Here’s a captivating video that perfectly captures the magic of Venice’s carnival. It showcases the enchanting atmosphere of Piazza San Marco, where tourists mingle with the carnival masks, creating moments of pure joy and excitement. <video_cap> Venice - carnival masks are photographed with tourists in piazza san marco </video_cap>
I could really use some uplifting music right now. Can you find a video of a happy man in headphones, listening to cheerful music and dancing in an armchair in a cozy room at home?

Absolutely! Here’s a video that perfectly captures the essence of joy and relaxation. Watch as a young man in casual wear, sitting in an armchair in a cozy room at night, enjoys his weekend by listening to cheerful music on his smartphone. His infectious happiness will surely brighten up your day. <video_cap> Happy man in headphones listens to cheerful music on smartphone sitting and dancing in armchair in cozy room at home at night. young male person in casual wear is relaxing on weekend. 4k static shot </video_cap>
I’d like to see a video of cute adorable children having fun together. It would be great if they were isolated on a white background.

Absolutely! I have just the video in mind. Get ready to witness the joyous sight of cute and adorable children engaging in fun activities, all set against a pristine white background. Enjoy the heartwarming moments of pure happiness and laughter! <video_cap> Cute adorable children having fun together isolated on white background </video_cap>
I’m in need of some visual tranquility. Is there a video that showcases a waterfall cascading over moss-covered rocks, with the camera gradually panning towards a lush green landscape?

Absolutely! I have the perfect video to soothe your soul. Watch as water gently trickles on mossy rocks beneath a captivating waterfall, creating a serene atmosphere. The camera slowly pans to the right, unveiling a breathtaking view of a lush and vibrant green landscape that will transport you to a state of pure tranquility. <video_cap> Water trickles on mossy rocks underneath a waterfall, panning right towards a lush green landscape </video_cap>
